tool_description: This API returns standings, schedule, news and more for f1 (Formula One)
name: F1 Motorsport Data
title: F1 Motorsport Data

api_list.name: F1 Athlete Info
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves F1 Athlete Info

Parameters:
athleteId (* required)

### Note: You can get the athleteId on other endpoint such as schedule, standings, ESPN Webite...

api_list.name: F1 News
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves current F1 News

Parameters:
limit (Default: 25)

api_list.name: Current Scoreboard
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-motorsport-data.p.rapidapi.com/current-scoreboard"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-motorsport-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-motorsport-data.p.rapidapi.com/current-scoreboard"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-motorsport-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: F1 Scoreboard
api_list.description:
Get F1 Scoreboard


Parameters:
year (Format YYYY)
month (Format MM)
day (Format DD)

api_list.name: F1 Race Report
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves F1 Race Report

Parameters:
eventId (* required)

### Note: This eventId is the same as the race id. You can get it on ESPN or make some calls to schedule and get the id...

api_list.name: Standings by Controllers
api_list.description:
Get Standings by Controllers

Parameters:
year (Format YYYY)

api_list.name: Standings by Drivers
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves Standings by Drivers

Parameters:
year (Format YYYY)

api_list.name: F1 Schedule
api_list.description:
This endpoint gets f1 schedule

Parameters:
year (Format YYYY)
